1370: Hildegardis moved to Cingel.C.6 after marriage.
Got married to Vandelghis at age 14 in 1370.
Gave birth to Nellen in 1370 at age 14.
1373: Gave birth to Marisseis in 1373 at age 17.
1375: Gave birth to Nannen in 1375 at age 19.
1378: Gave birth to Gelmarus in 1378 at age 22.
1379: Lost daughter Nellen when Nellen was 10 years old.
1383: Gave birth to Kerstine in 1383 at age 27.
1385: Gave birth to Flore in 1385 at age 29.
1389: Lost son Gelmarus when Gelmarus was 12 years old.
1394: Gave birth to Willai in 1394 at age 38.
1395: Lost daughter Marisseis when Marisseis was 23 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
